title: credit点券插件怎么安装
author: l残月
txt_content:

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content: 扩展名错了。把zip改成jar，然后扔进plugins文件夹即可~

replies.author: l残月
replies.txt_content:
skyliye 发表于 2019-6-24 16:46
扩展名错了。把zip改成jar，然后扔进plugins文件夹即可~
谢谢大佬
